product_name: Delta Cycle Post Porter Bolt On Bike Rack - Special Buy
long_description: Increase the carrying capacity of your bike with the Delta Cycle Post Porter Bolt On Bike Rack. It attaches to any size seat post and carries up to 25 lbs. Rubber grippers keep the load in place. Strong aluminum welded construction stands up to frequent use. Fits any size seat post (24 - 32mm diameter). Special buy.
short_description: Increase the carrying capacity of your bike with the Delta Cycle Post Porter Bolt On Bike Rack. It attaches to any size seat post and carries up to 25 lbs.
